tool_description:
The single email verification and validation API is a great solution for verifying email addresses at the point of capture. It verifies if an email address is disposable, temporary, catch-all, fake, non-existent, and deliverable.

The verification involves serveral operations such as syntax validation, MX record check, SMTP check, catch all emails check, disposable emails check, etc.

We have maintained our database with disposable email domains from popular disposable email service providers...
name: Real Time Email Verification API
title: Real Time Email Verification API

api_list.name: Email Verification Endpoint
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to verify the email addresses.
